content: Looks beautiful. But what about recursive components? What if the Header.vue contains the following code: https://gist.github.com/james-bay/41f3f1ee438cdab801a9ea9b9bbb4c65 ? Console output: [Vue warn]: Unknown custom element: <v-button> - did you register the component correctly? For recursive components, make sure to provide the "name" option. (found in <VHeader> at /media/leonid/prjs/web/vue-button-tutorial/src/components/Header/Header.vue)
